subject: RE: A shipment from order #SSN5589 has been delivered
description_text:
Hi,  I know it isnt your fault, but just letting you know the package did not arrive as fedex claims.  The pic in the proof of delivery is not my house.  I have a dispute open with fedex.  The package in the pic they have doesn't even look like the right size.  We will have to see what they find out.Sent from Samsung Galaxy smartphone.

conversations.body_text: Hi jrley3,    I've confirmed the package is correct. Please verify your address:  John Ley  135 Adams Way 910  Firestone, CO 80520  United States  +1 303-518-7982

Yes, the address is correct.   I dont know what FedEx has done, still waiting to hear from them.  It certainly wasn't delivered to the correct address.  The pic they have in the 'proof of delivery ' is not our front door.  Our street isnt long, we drove around, no front doors look like the one in the pic.  How they managed to screw up so badly is beyond me.  Not very happy with them....Again, i do not blame you.  We may need you to initiate a claim, but lets see what they come back with in the next couple days.  Thanks!Sent from Samsung Galaxy smartphone.
-------- Original message --------
Hi jrley3,    Wishing you all the best!

Hi,
  The person FedEx delivered to just dropped them off here.   Yay for 
kind honest people!  Getting them set up now, thanks so much!


------ Original Message ------
From "service@simsonn.com"
Hi jrley3,    We're delighted to hear this good news. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you have any questions.
